content:
I just ran into an "internal compiler error" in rustc (called from cargo). It directs me to "https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports" for information about how to report this bug, but that part of "CONTRIBUTING.md" isn't there any more and the "Getting Started" section of the "rustc-dev-guide" doesn't appear to have this information either.

Is there information somewhere on how to submit a useful bug report for an ICE?
@Steven Bosnick You can report an issue, there's a template for internal compiler errors
We should probably change the link in the ICE message though...
Thanks for the heads up! we (rustc-dev-guide working group) updated the docs recently and it seems we missed that link. submitted a fix: #74037
